name: Gangsta Auto Thief: Hijack Hustle in West-Coast City (Crazy Extreme Chasing Hip-Hop for Adults, Boys, & Kids 12+)
name_original: Gangsta Auto Thief: Hijack Hustle in West-Coast City (Crazy Extreme Chasing Hip-Hop for Adults, Boys, & Kids 12+)
description:
Gangsta Auto Thief: Hijack Hustle in West-Coast City is the second game in the new Gangsta Auto Thief game series.

After leaving San Gangster City in Gangsta Auto Thief 1, the Main Homie In Charge moves to West-Coast City to pursue his career as a getaway driver.



Unlock new vehicles, crazy power-ups and get rich by stacking up on Dollars!

In the Real-Time Multiplayer mode you can battle your friends - who's the sickest gangsta slash car thief?


Welcome to the City of Crime. Control Tanks. Evade Helicopters. Be a Gangsta Hummer. And really just drive like hell!

DOWNLOAD THIS GAME NOW!
